title: Bachelor of Science in Sociology Degree
description: The sociology degree will prepare you to understand and manage diversity, modernization and social change from local to global. The program's core competencies prepare you to enter careers requiring technological ability, communication, data gathering, analysis, community awareness and involvement, problem-solving, and critical thinking. This degree will also provide you with an understanding of the structure and functioning of groups and organizations, greater awareness of the environment, critical self-reflection, and interpersonal and intercultural skills.
careers: Public Relations, Marketing and Sales, Human Resources (Personnel Management), Urban Planning, Community Development.
school: Department of Sociology and Criminal Justice
